Generally clear skies PERIOD Low 42F PERIOD Winds light and variable PERIOD

Updated November     pm



Follow the yellow brick road either with Dorothy as a character from The Wizard of Oz or as the loving Dorothy herself PERIOD Then travel through all adventures and learn all the same lessons that Dorothy and her friends the Scarecrow the Tin Man and the Cowardly Lion learn on their way to the beautiful Emerald City to see the Wizard of Oz PERIOD Saturday night the Princess Theatre will host  a multimedia performance of music lights and sound PERIOD Decorations and theatrical sets will make the audience feel right at Kansas PERIOD The threedimensional tornado by will make you hold onto your costume PERIOD Oh yeah there is a  prize for the best Wizard of Oz costume PERIOD

The tornado blows you right into Munchkin village and sets you on the 180foot yellow brick road that will be rolled out into the Princess PERIOD Soon just like the movie you will meet the scarecrow in the cornfield the tin man in the apple orchard and the lion in his forest PERIOD Each scene and a slide show on an 80foot screen will remind the audience of the Scarecrows wanting a brain the Tin Mans missing heart the Lions lack of courage and Dorothys desire to go home PERIOD

Will Howard is the head promoter for  and a local DJ for Cheers PERIOD

 Howard said PERIOD 

After traveling the long yellow brick road you dance into the poppy field PERIOD But once you are in you get entranced by Emerald Citys DJs 

Simply Butta will take you through a turntablistic jungle DJ Dragon will have you floating with his Psychedelic Trance and Evanescent brings you higher with his Hard Dark Trance PERIOD They all hide behind the curtain like the Wizard and produce amazing visual affects on the 80foot theatre screen PERIOD Midsouth Lasers will cover the dance floor stateoftheart bluegreen lasers PERIOD

Inside Emerald City will be free massage therapy by licensed therapist Kristy Blount and Chris Bundy PERIOD The show starts at  p.m PERIOD with Pink Floyds The Dark Side of the Moon which is synchronized with the movie when started at the third roar of the MGM lion PERIOD Rumor has it that this is a traditional ritual for those who like to use the drug LSD or mushrooms PERIOD

 Howard said PERIOD

This is the third time  has come to the Princess Theatre and each time they have had a good turnout but have not made a profit PERIOD

 Howard said PERIOD

 starts at  p.m PERIOD this Saturday and ends at  a.m PERIOD Admission is  at the door PERIOD For more information go to www.msraves.com PERIOD
